p: The aim of this study was to examine the anti-inflammatory effect of three chemotypes of thyme essential oil and their main compounds on lipopolysaccharide (LPS)-induced BV-2 microglia. Furthermore, this study is the first in which the anti-inflammatory effect of geraniol and thujanol chemotypes of thyme oil ( Thymus vulgaris L.) and their main compounds (geraniol and thujanol) was examined on BV-2 microglia.
